instructions: ## Gamma World 1e Character Sheet**Current Version:** 1.02**[Changelog](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/GammaWorld1e/Readme.md)**This sheet has both a Human and Mutant sheet, and a Monster Sheet for the Judge that is switchable via a tab at the top left of the sheet.### Player Sheets* All of the roll buttons (shown as a d20 dice) have roll templates.* Attack rolls show the AC hit### Monster Sheet* All of the roll buttons have roll templates and many of them go to the GM* In-sheet ability to create non-player creature mutations
